summary: Admin panel application with client VM status management, live chat support system, and multi-admin member management
architectural_notes: Real-time VM status tracking system required
Live chat messaging system between clients and administrators
Multi-admin authentication and role management system

existing_features.title: Display VM status indicator for each client in the admin panel client list with visual differentiation for each state (online/offline/maintenance)
Add ability to change VM status for individual clients in the admin panel through the client edit modal
Add a floating chat button on the client dashboard that opens a chat window for communication with administrators
Create an admin chat interface in the admin panel to view and respond to client messages
Create an admin member management interface in the admin panel to add, edit, and remove administrator accounts
Update admin login page to authenticate against the backend's stored administrator accounts instead of hardcoded credentials

new_feature_requests.summary: Client VM status indicator (online/offline/maintenance) editable per client in admin panel
Floating chat button for clients to open support chat window with administrators
Admin panel functionality to add and manage multiple administrator members with login access
Add a VM status field to each client record that can be set to 'online', 'offline', or 'maintenance'
Create backend data structures and functions to store and manage chat messages between clients and administrators
Add backend functionality to store and manage multiple administrator accounts with credentials
